bug.description: I see that use_amp is deprecated but since the Trainer still accepts it as an argument, I believe this is still a bug. The issue is that the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/3c2fd560aa4d31b4f48ee225b83361deec53d9c7/pytorch_lightning/core/hooks.py#L136-L143>hook that deals with this</denchmark-link> specifically checks if . However, the Trainer does not set if . Proposed solution: if use_amp is passed in, set precision = 16 and raise a deprecation warning.
